allow: Bash("venv\Scripts\python.exe" manage.py shell -c "from sitehome.models import SiteConfiguration; print(''Total antes:'', SiteConfiguration.objects.count()); config = SiteConfiguration.objects.get_configuration(); print(''ID:'', config.id); config.company_name = ''Sys Passo''; config.save(); print(''Total depois de atualizar:'', SiteConfiguration.objects.count()); print(''Singleton funcionando corretamente!'')")
